docs.snippet: LEAD: Michael Jordan of the Chicago Bulls, who is leading the National Basketball Association in scoring with 36.9 points a game so far this season, has tallied 4,233 points for an average of 30.0 during 141 games in his first two and a half seaso...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Michael Jordan of the Chicago Bulls, who is leading the National Basketball Association in scoring with 36.9 points a game so far this season, has tallied 4,233 points for an average of 30.0 during 141 games in his first two and a half seasons as a pro. He was limited to 18 games last season because of a broken bone in his foot.

docs.snippet: LEAD: A Federal district judge has ordered a woman who helped aliens flee political upheaval in Central America to report to prison to begin serving a six-month term. The woman, Stacy Lynn Merkt, was sentenced in March 1985 after being convicted o...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: A Federal district judge has ordered a woman who helped aliens flee political upheaval in Central America to report to prison to begin serving a six-month term. The woman, Stacy Lynn Merkt, was sentenced in March 1985 after being convicted of conspiracy to transport illegal aliens. The judge, Filemon Vela, denied her motion to reconsider the sentence on Jan.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: THE Juilliard School has long presented public new-music concerts, primarily as part of its students' education but also as an admission-free offering to the New York audience. The concerts used to be rather randomly programmed, but since Joseph W.
